headline: Equinix Collaborates with Dell Technologies to Help Enterprises Deploy Flexible and Scalable AI Infrastructure
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, announced today a private AI solution that lets businesses train AI models in scalable, cost-efficient public and private clouds while ensuring enhanced control, security and low-latency deployment on-premises.

headline: Equinix Inc. (EQIX): Are Hedge Funds Bullish On This Data Storage Stock Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Data Storage Stocks To Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Equinix Inc. (NASDAQ:EQIX) stands against the other data storage stocks. Data storage involves systematically archiving digital information to ensure its availability and security for future use. […]

headline: AMS-IX internet exchange traffic grows 200% in Equinix's Lagos Data Center
summary: Equinix, Inc. , the world's digital infrastructure company, has supported a growth in traffic of around 200%, increasing around 30Gbps to almost 100Gbps in just over a year since the implementation...
